scripts.cpln-image-build: cpln image build --push --org $npm_package_config_org --name $npm_package_name:$npm_package_version && npm version patch
scripts.cpln-image-workload-create: cpln image build --push --org $npm_package_config_org --name $npm_package_name:$npm_package_version && cpln workload create --name $npm_package_name --image //image/$npm_package_name:$npm_package_version --public --org $npm_package_config_org --gvc $npm_package_config_gvc && npm version patch
scripts.cpln-image-workload-update: cpln image build --push --org $npm_package_config_org --name $npm_package_name:$npm_package_version && cpln workload update $npm_package_name --set spec.containers.$npm_package_name.image=//image/$npm_package_name:$npm_package_version  --org $npm_package_config_org --gvc $npm_package_config_gvc
scripts.terraform: terraform plan -out deploy_dev && terraform apply deploy_dev
